articles.title: When Hudson met Connor: Inside the Zoom call where ‘Heated Rivalry’ found its stars
articles.description: TORONTO — When Hudson Williams and Connor Storrie logged into a Zoom room for their first chemistry read, casting directors Jenny Lewis and Sara Kay felt it instantly. Even through a screen, the spark was undeniable. “Heated Rivalry” had found its hockey heartthrobs: Shane Hollander and Ilya Rozanov
